title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 505 - Requirements Regarding Testing, Confidentiality And Precautions Concerning The Human Immunodeficiency Virus (hiv) And Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (aids)
